summary: Defines a collection of Pydantic-based data models and custom parameter types used by the Agenta SDK to represent, validate, and serialize various kinds of input data such as binary content, files, URLs, numeric values, text, and selectable options, as well as utilities for context handling and message formatting.
business_intent: Enable type‑safe, validated, and well‑documented input specifications for API interactions within the Agenta command‑line interface, facilitating automatic schema generation, JSON conversion, and safe file handling.
